description: This file defines the NoteController class, which exposes REST API endpoints for CRUD operations on notes, such as creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes. It uses Spring Boot annotations and Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: REST Controller managing CRUD endpoints for Note entities.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note using data from NoteCreateRequest.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its UUID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by UUID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its UUID.
